comment: Not sure why there are a ton of 1 Stars for Professor Thompson. He gets right into the content and he does an amazing job explaining problems if you ask questions. As someone who is not good at math, Professor Thompson did an amazing job helping me understand everything. There is a ton of work, but he grades very easily and provides extra credit.

Professor Thompson was great, I don't understand why there are bad reviews for this class. He wants his students to pass and the course work isn't hard unless you make it hard for yourself. There is a weekly homework (never hard to do) and 3 tests including the final. He provided an extra credit project at the end of the semester. Take this class!!

He was a very thorough professor and would give several explanations for concepts that were more abstract/harder to understand. The content is difficult but he really is a great professor who gives several resources. Every test has a study guide very similar to the exam and he gives pop quizzes for extra credit that help prepare for the exams.

Honestly shocked at the current rating that Prof T has. Everyone knows that BStat is hard so if you don't try, you're just not going to get it. Regardless of what prof you take. 3 exams, 13 hw assignments (which REALLY help as they focus on key concepts for exams). Lecture slides are very thorough & easy to comprehend. Overall, enjoyed his class!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: I am writing this the day of the final. Have not taken yet. I will get, at best a c and at worst a failing grade. He does not explain well, He will not provide solutions for our study guides prior to the test.
Tbh Professor T is a nice guy this is just a hard class. He is always available outside of class and always answers emails. Try not to skip and do the hw and you should pass.

comment: Professor Thompson was super smart and knowledgeable but it seemed as if he didnt know how to get that point across and expected us to know what we were learning before learning the material. Whether you showed up to class or not didnt really matter it was impossible. He is however understanding and does lots of office hours.

Class is made up of a weekly homework assignment with 3 tests. He is a really smart and friendly guy, however, he is not a very good teacher. He makes the tests and homework himself, so it is really hard to find resources to learn from. He tutors during office hours, make sure to go to those. The tests are incredibly hard, class average was a 33%

Mr. Thompson is a very smart guy. Too smart to teach unfortunately. He is a research professor who had to teach and treated every class as a review session. All homework and tests are written by hand so good luck finding examples online to help you. The university is lucky to have someone as smart as him, but as a student taking his class beware.
